SELECT ue.id ,ue.employee_id ,ue.realname ,ue.nickname ,case gender when 1 then '男' when 2 then '女' else '保密' end as genderStr ,ue.avatar ,ue.mobile ,ue.email ,ue.birthday ,sd.name as dept ,sl.name as level ,sp.name as position ,scpro.name as province ,scc.name as cityName ,scd.name as district ,ue.address ,ue.enrollment_date ,ue.formal_date ,ue.leave_date ,ue.work_year ,ue.`status` ,ue.note ,ue.create_user ,ue.create_time ,ue.update_user ,ue.update_time from ums_employee ue left join sys_dept sd on ue.dept_id = sd.id left join sys_level sl on ue.level_id = sl.id left join sys_position sp on sp.id = ue.position_id left join sys_city scpro on scpro.id = ue.province_id left join sys_city scc on scc.id = ue.city_id left join sys_city scd on scd.id = ue.city_id where ue.mark=1
AND (lower(ue.realname) like lower(concat('%', #{query.mobile}, '%')) OR lower(ue.mobile) like lower(concat('%', #{query.mobile}, '%')) OR lower(ue.employee_id) like lower(concat('%', #{query.mobile}, '%')))
